meanings.definition: A person or company that forwards or sends goods or messages to a destination.
meanings.sent1: The forwarder delivered the package to the customer's house.
meanings.sent2: The forwarder shipped the products to different countries.
meanings.sent3: The forwarder made sure the message reached the right person.
meanings.sent4: The forwarder was like a reliable messenger, always delivering on time.
meanings.sent5: The forwarder's job is crucial in ensuring items reach their intended recipients.

meanings.definition: A person who advances or promotes a cause or idea.
meanings.sent1: As a forwarder of environmental awareness, she organized recycling campaigns.
meanings.sent2: The forwarder of education initiatives worked tirelessly to improve literacy rates.
meanings.sent3: The forwarder of positivity always had a smile on his face.
meanings.sent4: She was a forwarder of change, inspiring others to make a difference.
meanings.sent5: The forwarder's passion for the cause was evident in every action taken.

meanings.definition: A device or mechanism that moves something forward.
meanings.sent1: The conveyor belt acted as a forwarder, transporting items to the next station.
meanings.sent2: The forwarder in the factory ensured smooth movement of materials along the production line.
meanings.sent3: The toy car's forwarder feature made it exciting for kids to play with.
meanings.sent4: The escalator served as a forwarder, carrying people to different levels of the mall.
meanings.sent5: The forwarder mechanism propelled the rocket into space with great force.
